name: Radisphere National Radiology Group
overview: Headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, Radisphere is the largest and fastest-growing national radiology group in the United States. Radisphere has been setting the standard for quality in radiology since 2001. As the exclusive radiology provider for 35 hospitals in 11 states, Radisphere partners with its customers to measurably improve quality, increase medical staff satisfaction, reduce costs and drive growth. Its local radiologists are supported by the industry’s premier network of subspecialists and a proprietary, cloud-based technology platform. Radisphere’s standards-based approach guarantees faster, more accurate diagnoses, appropriate utilization, and the highest quality of patient care.

relationships.title: Chief Medical Officer, Chairman of Radiology
Chief Quality & Risk Officer & Executive Director of the Radiology Quality Institute

funding_rounds.source_description: Radiology Provider Radisphere Receives $15M Venture Loan

milestones.description: Radisphere is named a Red Herring Top 100 North America winner, making it the only radiology services provider and one of only three healthcare company winners. Red Herring’s Top 100 North America Award recognizes leading private companies for their innov
milestones.source_description: Radisphere Wins the Red Herring Top 100 North America Award

milestones.description: •	Radisphere becomes the first radiology group to voluntarily participate in Clarity Group Inc.’s Patient Safety Organization (PSO). Through this collaboration, Radisphere reports quality data to Clarity PSO to help the field of radiology further identify
milestones.source_description: Radisphere Joins Clarity PSO to Advance Radiology Quality

milestones.description: •	An October KLAS report revealed Radisphere had the highest score in the area of report quality (8.3), high marks for final report turnaround times (8.6), and an exceptional level of satisfaction among Radisphere's clients (95 percent).
milestones.source_description: New KLAS Report Reveals Radisphere Provides Superior Turnaround Times and Quality Reports for Radiology Services

milestones.description: •	Radisphere launches the Radisphere iPhone® application to further improve the speed and quality of radiology services at its hospital clients. The application provides referring physicians with access to Final Reports, Addendums, and Critical Findings,
milestones.source_description: Radisphere iPhone Application Speeds Delivery of Critical Radiology Information to Improve Quality of Care
